title: rheix
author: rheix
content: Move to Earn anytime and anywhereRheix present a game play Move-to-Earn, and you earn daily by playing.Stand a chance to earn rewards irrespective of your location and skill level. Get Earn rare and valuable Items anytime and anywhere. It is super-easy to play and earn with moving!Complete Solutions for Game RealityAs part of the Rheix ecosystem, our competent developers designed this "Move-to-Earn" game to provide multiple platform of earning in addition to entertaining and providing you with endless hours of fun.Our VisionRheix want to make reality technology that gamifies everyday activities, turning them into captivating moving adventures. Players traverse a virtual realm, embarking on quests that enhance physical and mental well-being. As they advance, they reap rewards and unlock new challenges, fostering continuous motivation and engagement.Our MissionTo pioneer the future of human-computer interaction by seamlessly blending the physical and digital realms through an immersive ARVRXR gaming experience powered by cutting-edge AI and spatial computing technology.Name : RHEIX (RHX)Total Supply : 21,000,000,000 RHXCollateral  : 850,000 RHXReward : 6,000 RHXBlock Time : ~150 SECONDS56% SMARTNODE29% MINER15% DEVELOPMENTMore info visit our website : https://rheix.comand join Discord : https://discord.gg/9wgVDHMMyR

comments.author: rheix
comments.created_time: December 06, 2023, 01:12:42 PMLast edit: December 07, 2023, 02:12:09 AM by rheix
comments.body: I'm really sure, We never try to deceive anyone.Mining was carried out without confirmation to us as developers.While we were doing the test, we never made contact with any mining pool to inform that this project was ready.Because at that time, we were still in the testing stage.We don't know why some miners take the initiative to mine without waiting for an official announcement.No one made contact with us when the team was still in the Testnet stage.We should not be the ones who are responsible for each miner's initiative to do mining.I think it's some miscommunication.Now all preparations have been completed to go publicWe will keep work hard & focus on developing this projectWe are happy to open up opportunities to collaborate.As the Developer Team on this project, we apologize deeply for mistakes that we ourselves didn't mean to make.In the future, we want to work well.We hope this project can grow, so everyone has a good solutionThank You

comments.author: wkholi
comments.body: This project is a SCAM he let us all mine and build bags of it and now he says that it was all testnet! people even started building nodes.This project is not to be trusted.He will screw you anytime.

comments.author: buca73
comments.body: SCAM, BE AWARE! It`s scam as developer was greedy to have all coins premined before public launch. He started new chain in silence and after mining alone all the coins till now , he announced project and named old chain testnet. Of course he deleted old files from Github removed old explorer.... Just stay away, simply it`s scam.

comments.author: Hamitoglu
comments.body: These people have no respect for people's work, they stopped the project without any apologies, they did it together with rplant, which is even sadder for me. They reset people's wallets and now they expect others to believe them, if the beginning of a project is like this, what to expect in the future!!!SCAM SCAM SCAM SCAM SCAM SCAM SCAM...

comments.author: rheix
comments.body: I'm really sure, We never try to deceive anyone.Mining was carried out without confirmation to us as developers.While we were doing the test, we never made contact with any mining pool to inform that this project was ready.Because at that time, we were still in the testing stage.We don't know why some miners take the initiative to mine without waiting for an official announcement.No one made contact with us when the team was still in the Testnet stage.We should not be the ones who are responsible for each miner's initiative to do mining.I think it's some miscommunication.Now all preparations have been completed to go publicWe will keep work hard & focus on developing this projectWe are happy to open up opportunities to collaborate.As the Developer Team on this project, we apologize deeply for mistakes that we ourselves didn't mean to make.In the future, we want to work well.We hope this project can grow, so everyone has a good solutionThank You

comments.author: Omnicron69
comments.body: Quote from: rheix on December 07, 2023, 02:49:42 AMI'm really sure, We never try to deceive anyone.Mining was carried out without confirmation to us as developers.While we were doing the test, we never made contact with any mining pool to inform that this project was ready.Because at that time, we were still in the testing stage.We don't know why some miners take the initiative to mine without waiting for an official announcement.No one made contact with us when the team was still in the Testnet stage.We should not be the ones who are responsible for each miner's initiative to do mining.I think it's some miscommunication.Now all preparations have been completed to go publicWe will keep work hard & focus on developing this projectWe are happy to open up opportunities to collaborate.As the Developer Team on this project, we apologize deeply for mistakes that we ourselves didn't mean to make.In the future, we want to work well.We hope this project can grow, so everyone has a good solutionThank YouContact was made through github but you did not respond.You premined to block xxxx then one pool picked it up, then another, 6 or 8 smartnodes got built by miners and then your rolled the chain back to the block that the first pool picked it up. You claimedthat was the testnet. So you went mainnet (for your premine) then test net then back to mainnet.Everyone one who mined, spent money on power and rentals lost all the coins mined, but not you andyour premine.After the chain rollback people started over at a zero blanace. When it looked like a few people were getting close todeploying some smartnodes, you deployed 11 smartnodes with your premine, effectively making italmost impossible for miners to mine enough to build nodes. Only way was to buy the coin that youcontrolled 71% of. Then you get listed on a exchangeand you sell some of your nodes, by some estimates you made $30k with this BS.Now your listed on MPS and this info needs to be known. This project screwed so many people.

comments.body: You should stay away from masternode coins, they are nothing more than a ponzi scheme
